successes.title: The Guide to Glorantha
successes.description: A two-volume set of 10" x 12" color hardback books containing the geography, history and cultures of Glorantha.

Pledges.description: WELL-WISHER:  The Gloranthan Tribe thanks you for your support. Please visit our website for more freebies and more info on the world of Glorantha.
LAY MEMBER:  PDF edition of the Argan Argar Atlas. Let your journey begin!
TRADER:  Softcover printed edition and PDF edition of the Argan Argar Atlas. All the geographical maps in one place.
SCRIBE:  PDF edition of the Guide to Glorantha.
DWARF:  PDF editions of the Guide to Glorantha and the Argan Argar Atlas, plus the Wallpaper & Background Art Pack. Technology is your ally!
INITIATE:  Hardcover printed edition of the Guide to Glorantha.
SHAMAN: Hardcover printed and PDF editions of the Guide to Glorantha. Your name will be listed on the contributor page of the book.
DAEMON: Printed versions of the Hardcover Guide to Glorantha and the Softcover Argan Argar Atlas. No PDFs. Your name will be listed on the contributor page of the book.

RUNE MASTER:  Hardcover printed and PDF editions of the Guide to Glorantha and softcover printed and PDF editions of the Argan Argar Atlas. Your name will be listed on the contributor page of the book. Immediate download access to the PDF “sneak peek” preview files.
HIGH PRIEST:  Rune Master reward level, plus Argan Argar Atlas upgrade from softcover to hardcover.
RUNE LORD/PRIEST:  High Priest reward level, plus 4 folded Central Genertela Maps.
GODLEARNER:  Rune Lord/Priest reward level, plus personalized dust jackets for both books and a Godlearner certificate signed by Greg.
ILLUMINATE:  Rune Lord/Priest reward level, with faux leather cover upgrade for the Guide, personalized dust jackets for both books, and a Nysalorian certificate signed by Greg.
UNHOLY TRIO:  (Save $100) 3 Runemaster reward levels shipped to a single overseas address. You do not need to specify which of you is each member of the trio, unless you think that is cool.
MASTER OF LUCK AND DEATH:  Godlearner reward level, plus Greg "archival" Map set, plus the (11x17) Poster map set, and a MoLaD D20.

PATRON OF THE ARTS: MoLaD reward level, plus you can specify the topic of one picture (B&W or color), which must be significant and/or relevant to Glorantha and must be approved by the art director. The backer can be named in the guide as the patron of that picture. You'll also get a high-quality print of your picture, autographed by the artist. Free shipping included.

ETERNAL CHAMPION:  MoLaD reward level, plus Jeff Richard will run a special 4 hour Gloranthan game for you and up to four of your friends at Eternal Con 2013 in Bacharach, germany. All your convention related costs to be paid by you. Free shipping included.

ROPED-IN:  MoLaD reward level, plus Jeff Richard will run a special 4 hour Gloranthan game for you and up to four of your friends at RopeCon 2013 in Finland. All your convention related costs to be paid by you. Free shipping included.

DEMI-GOD:  MoLaD reward level plus:  Come to Berlin and see the complete archives of Greg Stafford’s original maps and Gloranthan files. Then play in a 3-4 hour Gloranthan game run by Jeff Richard and his HQ2 Gloranthan roleplaying group. You must provide transportation to Berlin, Germany, and must arrange for your own accommodations (although we will certainly suggest locations for every price range). Scheduling must work with our calendar. Email us to determine dates.

PROVINCIAL OVERSEER: You are large and in charge (of the Orlanthi provinces!). MoLaD level, plus a hardcover full color version of the GreGarth Atlas of Lunar Provincial Lore. This amazing collection of hand-drawn historical maps details: the history of Peloria from the Dawn to 1650 in 50 year increments; the history of Prehistoric Peloria; the history of the Lunar Wanes: and a variety of maps showing other important details of the Dara Happan and Lunar Empires. Includes attached notes and commentary from Greg. You can even help design the custom cover.

7 MOTHERS/LIGHTBRINGERS: MoLaD reward level, plus the ultimate 15 volume "Roots of Glorantha" series of unpublished Gloranthan monographs written by Greg Stafford. Each printed volume is approximate100 pages in length. You get to pick your favorite 7 Mother or Lightbringer for the cover theme and color. Free shipping included.

SHENG SELERIS: Who else would arrive unexpectedly as one great, last surprise! The Son of Morning - The New Celestial Power! He and his mighty horde have thundered in from across the vast, empty wastes to claim all that lies before them. You will claim a $4500 combination of rewards offered in this Kickstarter as your tribute.

THE RED EMPEROR: There can be only one! The Son of the Red Goddess, Lord of the Four Quarters, Staff and Pillar to God, Leader of the Egi, Shah of Shahs, and the Bright and Illustrious Emperor of Dara Happa. So powerful you can complete a stretch goal with but a wave of your hand. You will have your own personal shopping assistant to select your own combination of any of the items offered in this Kickstarter. Even though you want for nothing, we will also present you with a simple leather dice bag containing your own personal dice set cast in the finest Imperial silver.
